title: 【理工學院公告】理工一館之學院/系所/中心異地辦公(移至理工三館)
author: 潘小姐
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 理工學院 - 潘小姐 - tzuyu@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話3502
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生_兼任教師_退休教職員
標題： 【理工學院公告】理工一館之學院/系所/中心異地辦公(移至理工三館)
日期： Wed, 10 Apr 2024 13:55:59 +0800

因受地震及火災影響，導致理工一館停電、停水，故理工學院及所屬單位(應用數學系、物理學系、化學系、農業驗證與服務提升中心、貴重儀器使用中心)，目前皆暫時移至理工三館辦公，相關訊息如下:
1.     理工三館B104:理工學院、應用數學系、物理學系、化學系。
2.     理工三館A204:農業驗證與服務提升中心、貴重儀器使用中心。
如有洽公及收送文需求請至所處辦公室，造成不便敬請見諒。

Due to the impact of the earthquake and the fire, the Science and EngineeringⅠis currently experiencing power and water outages. As a result, the College of Science and Engineering and its affiliated units (including the Department of Applied Mathematics, Department of Physics, Department of Chemistry, Agricultural Certification and Service Enhancement Center, and Science and Engineering College Instrumentation Center) have temporarily relocated to the Science and EngineeringⅢ. Here are the relevant details:

Room B104: the office of the College of Science and Engineering, the office of Department of Applied Mathematics, the office of Department of Physics, and the office Department of Chemistry.

Room A204: the office of Agricultural Certification and Service Enhancement Center, and the office of Science and Engineering College Instrumentation Center.

If you have any official matters or documents deliver, please visit the temporarily offices. We apologize for any inconveniences.
